itemDisplayName: Configure client services' access, via a security group.
description: This template configures three regional user-assigned managed identities, that can be used to read from a Blob Storage account, via a security group. The user-assigned managed identities are added as members of the security group, and the security group is assigned an Azure Reader role to the Blob Storage account.
summary: This template configures client services that can be used to read from Blob storage, via a Microsoft Entra security group
